name: Knights in Shining Armor: Our King's Tale - Episode 1
name_original: Knights in Shining Armor: Our King's Tale - Episode 1
description:
Knights in Shining Armor: Our King's Tale - Episode 1 is an adventure game developed by Corbomite Games and Fluff Entertainment. It came out on 28-09-2010. Corbomite Games published the game.
You can play Knights in Shining Armor: Our King's Tale - Episode 1 on PC.
